title: Iran Says Dozens Are Killed in Strike on School
summary_full: The strike on an elementary school in the southern Iran town of Minab was one of two attacks that appear to have hit schools during U.S. and Israeli strikes on Iran on Saturday.
summary_public: The strike on an elementary school in the southern Iran town of Minab was one of two attacks that appear to have hit schools during U.S. and Israeli strikes on Iran on Saturday.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: U.S. and Israeli strikes on Iran

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Dozens Are Killed in Strike on School
